title: MD
biography:
Venkataraman, Venkatraman and Venkitaraman are names of Indian origin, used both as family names and as masculine given names. People with those names include:Family nameAneesh Venkataraman, American, Journalist, political speech writer
Ashok Venkitaraman, British cancer researcher
C. S. Venkataraman (1918–94), Indian mathematician
G. S. Venkataraman (1930–98), Indian botanist and academic administrator
Ganesh Venkatraman, Indian film actor
Ganeshan Venkataraman, Indian physicist, writer and academic administrator
Janaki Venkataraman (1921–2010), First Lady of India 1987–92, wife of R. Venkataraman
Krishnasami Venkataraman (1901–81), Indian chemist
Padma Venkataraman, Indian social activist, daughter of R. Venkataraman and Janaki Venkataraman
Padma Venkatraman, Indian author of children's books
R. Venkataraman, Indian lawyer, independence activist and politician, President of India 1987–92
R. Venkataraman, Indian cricketer (c.1934–2020)
S. Venkataraman (1903–80), Indian politician
S. V. Venkatraman (1911–98), Indian film actor, singer, and music director
T. R. Venkataraman, Indian politician
Trivandrum R. Venkataraman (1938–2010), classical Indian musician and veena player, in the Carnatic traditionGiven nameAlluri Venkatarama Raju, father of Indian independence activist Alluri Sitarama Raju
V. Balakrishnan (physicist), Indian theoretical physicist
Venkataraman Iyer, Indian sage and jivanmukta
V. Krishnamurthy, Indian civil servant
V. Raghavan, Sanskrit scholar and musicologist
Venkatraman Radhakrishnan (1929–2011), Indian space scientist
Venkatraman Ramakrishnan, Indian-born American and British structural biologist, awarded a share of the 2009 Nobel Prize in Chemistry
S. Ve. Shekher, Tamil playwright and film actor
Venkataraman Subramanya, Indian international cricketer
aiSummary: Venkataraman Ramakrishnan is a structural biology specialist with an H-index of 29 at MRC Laboratory of Molecular Biology (Member). Has been published in Nature biomedical engineering, The Lancet. Neurology. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
